scripts.tags: psc-docs --format ctags `find bower_components src test -name *.purs -not -name externs.purs` `find bower_components src test -name externs.purs`  > tags
scripts.compile:server: psc-bundle output/**/{index,foreign}.js --main Main --module Main | java -jar compiler.jar --js_output_file server.js
scripts.compile:netw: psc-bundle output/**/{index,foreign}.js --main App.Networking --module App.Networking | java -jar compiler.jar --js_output_file netw.js
scripts.compile:client: psc-bundle output/**/{index,foreign}.js --main App.GUI --module App.GUI | browserify -e - | java -jar compiler.jar --js_output_file static/client.js
scripts.dev:client: psc-bundle output/**/{index,foreign}.js --main App.GUI --module App.GUI | browserify -e - -o static/client.js
scripts.start: npm run compile:server && npm run compile:client && node server.js
scripts.dev: npm run dev:server     && npm run dev:client     && node server.js
scripts.watch:client: watch  'npm run test && npm run dev:client' src/ --ignoreDotFiles
scripts.--nodemon: to check if it's a good solution for reloading serverside code
